info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued July 01 at 10:26PM ADT until July 03 at 7:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM AST SATURDAY THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the first High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. For the second High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...In Virgin Islands, St. Thomas, St. John, and Adjacent Islands. Southwest Puerto Rico. * WHEN...From 6 AM AST Saturday through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
